name: Iron Recon
description:
Iron Recon is First-Person Shooter (FPS) Mech simulation game where the player does reconnaissance on an unknown planet while fighting off hostile forces. The player is dropped with their Mech from a spaceship and must adapt their play style to survive in the random environment they encounter.

6 week project using Unreal Engine

Randomization Features:
Terrain: Forrest, Desert, Snow
Time: Day, Night
Weather: Rain, Dust, Blizzard, Sun
Weapons: Assault Rifle, Sniper Rifle, rocket launcher
